channel.title: Change item strings

item.title: Change item strings
item.dc:creator: @eagledude4 eagledude4
item.description:
@eagledude4 wrote:

Couldn’t find a tutorial, and came up with nothing but recolour topics with searching.

if(i == 6722) { //zombie head
class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
class8.aStringArray189[1] = “Display”;
}

that changes the first string from “talk-at” to Display, but how do I change the second string from “Display” to “Hold”?

Read full topic
